description.narrative: The development objective of the Project is to enhance the supply of natural gas in Pakistan by reducing the physical and commercial losses of gas in the pipeline system.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Loan Agreement, Schedule 2, B, II (a) | Description :Carry out an early-term review of the Project | Due Date:02-May-2014
Finance Agreement :Project Agreement, Schedule, I, A, 3 | Description :Appoint independent monitoring and evaluation consultant |Due Date :04-Feb-2013
Finance Agreement :Project Agreement, Schedule, II, C, 4 (a) | Description :Maintain a current ratio of not less than 1:1 |Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Project Agreement, Schedule, II, C, 5 (b) | Description :Maintain a debt service coverage ratio of minimum 1.0in FY13 and FY14; 1.1 in FY15; 1.2 in FY16 and FY17 | Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :Project Agreement, Schedule, Section I.C.1 (a) | Description :Compliance with Environmental and SocialManagement Framework | Frequency :Yearly
